channel.title: Need a lot of help running MoparScape
channel.description:
Hey there. I'm new here, and am unable to run MoparScape.
I have the newest Java, and have tried running MoparScape from the web-browser, and from the installer.
I have only logged in on MoparScape ONCE, and this was on the BuzzScape server. I have had no luck since.
Whenever I try, It says that the server "must be down".
When I click New Server to create my own HybridScape server, it still states thats the server must be down. I went down the server list trying 41 worlds, and none work. I am sure I meet all requirements, and have tried MoparScape on both Internet Explorer, and Mozilla Firefox.
Where am I going wrong?
Thanks. :)

item.title: Need a lot of help running MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @dbrain_1986 dbrain_1986
item.description:
@dbrain_1986 wrote:

Doesn’t work.

I can only get on 1 server through Hamachi and/or MoparScape client, and that is GTScape, which works fine.

Everything else does not work. Any help please?

Read full topic
item.source: Need a lot of help running MoparScape

item.title: Need a lot of help running MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Irl1 Owned Irl
item.description:
@Owned_Irl1 wrote:

did you join one of the hamachi channels?

once you do that… make sure the owner of that channel is online…

if so… then use the ip of that hamachi user…

88.108.142.176

port 43594

Read full topic

item.title: Need a lot of help running MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @dbrain_1986 dbrain_1986
item.description:
@dbrain_1986 wrote:

Hey there. I’m new here, and am unable to run MoparScape.

I have the newest Java, and have tried running MoparScape from the web-browser, and from the installer.

I have only logged in on MoparScape ONCE, and this was on the BuzzScape server. I have had no luck since.

Whenever I try, It says that the server “must be down”.

When I click New Server to create my own HybridScape server, it still states thats the server must be down. I went down the server list trying 41 worlds, and none work. I am sure I meet all requirements, and have tried MoparScape on both Internet Explorer, and Mozilla Firefox.

Where am I going wrong?

Thanks.
